findings.description: The function mints liquidity shares to the caller and updates pool reserves without verifying or transferring tokens from the caller to the contract.
findings.reasoning: The finding correctly identifies a business logic error in the function _0x8cd0a4, but it does not match the target vulnerability of arithmetic_error.

findings.description: The function calculates and returns withdrawal amounts but does not transfer tokens from the contract to the caller, nor verify contract balances.
findings.reasoning: The finding correctly identifies a business logic error in the function _0x390062, but it does not match the target vulnerability of arithmetic_error.

target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The target vulnerability of arithmetic_error was not mentioned in any of the findings.

notes: The findings correctly identify business logic errors in the functions _0x8cd0a4 and _0x390062, but they do not match the target vulnerability of arithmetic_error. The target vulnerability was not mentioned in any of the findings.
